mapper.update:
update
set FNAME = #{FNAME}, FSPECS = #{FSPECS}, FTEXTURE = #{FTEXTURE}, FAMOUNT = #{FAMOUNT}, FPRICE = #{FPRICE}, FREMARKS = #{FREMARKS}, CHECKIN_TIME = #{CHECKIN_TIME}, MAINTENANCE_CYCLE = #{MAINTENANCE_CYCLE}, FMANUFACTURER = #{FMANUFACTURER} where VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID = #{VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID}
mapper.select:
select b.FNAME EQM_BASE_NAME,
from f left join MDM_EQM_BASE b on f.EQM_BASE_ID=b.EQM_BASE_ID where f.VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID = #{VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID}

select b.FNAME EQM_BASE_NAME,
from f left join MDM_EQM_BASE b on f.EQM_BASE_ID=b.EQM_BASE_ID

select count(*) zs from
where EQM_BASE_ID = #{EQM_BASE_ID}

SELECT ISNULL(a.VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID, '') VULNERABLE_PARTS_ID, ISNULL(b.FNAME,'') SHEBEINAME, ISNULL(a.FNAME,'') YSJNAME, ISNULL(a.FSPECS,'') FSPECS, ISNULL(a.FTEXTURE,'') FTEXTURE, ISNULL(a.FAMOUNT,0) FAMOUNT, ISNULL(a.FMANUFACTURER,'') FMANUFACTURER, ISNULL(a.FPRICE,0) FPRICE, ISNULL(a.CHECKIN_TIME, '') CHECKIN_TIME, ISNULL(a.MAINTENANCE_CYCLE, 0) MAINTENANCE_CYCLE FROM MDM_EQM_VULNERABLE_PARTS a LEFT JOIN MDM_EQM_BASE b ON a.EQM_BASE_ID = b.EQM_BASE_ID WHERE DATEDIFF(DAY, a.CHECKIN_TIME, GETDATE()) = 0
